column4: I am having issue with certain keys on my keyboard under certain situations. Under Putty, the control key does not work. In other programs, the control key does not function properly. under firefox, control key does function correctly, and on the desktop.
Is anybody else having issue with control key working properly under PUTTY and certain other programs?
Well, for one, what is better than putty when trying to SSH into multiple remote hosts?
putty just sends the control key press, so it doesn't have standard rich application functionality
